staxel.village.dialogue.intro.Cecile.lin: Well now, this is just what the village needed!
Fresh bloo- no. Mea- hm. Eloquence, eloquence.
I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; and I have absolutely no intention of using you as a test subject!
^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop; tells me you were behind the construction of my new lab!
This is a little something for your troubles, though I really cannot thank you enough.
I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;. Do let me know if you happen to be interested in science.
I'm always on the lookout for new subj- assistants!
